data.title: The Comedienne (U.S. First Edition, First Printing) by Reymont, Wladyslaw S.: Good Hardcover (1920) 1st Edition
data.meta_description: 1st Edition - Hardcover - Putnam - 1920 - Condition: Good - No Jacket - First U.S. Edition, First Printing of this novel of theatrical players in provincial Poland by Nobel Prize laureate Wladyslaw S. Reymont. First novel by Reymont translated into English and his first book published in the United States. Published in advance of Reymont's selection as Nobel laureate but the introduction notes that he had been nominated for the prize. Includes a frontspiece color illustration by Frederick Dorr Steele on which the publisher has pasted a credit line for Steele. Blue cloth with gilt titles, 499 pages. There is soiling on the front cover, a previous owner name written twice on the front endpapers and the front hinge is a bit loose. - The Comedienne (U.S. First Edition, First Printing)
data.text:
About this Item

First U.S. Edition, First Printing of this novel of theatrical players in provincial Poland by Nobel Prize laureate Wladyslaw S. Reymont. First novel by Reymont translated into English and his first book published in the United States. Published in advance of Reymont's selection as Nobel laureate but the introduction notes that he had been nominated for the prize. Includes a frontspiece color illustration by Frederick Dorr Steele on which the publisher has pasted a credit line for Steele. Blue cloth with gilt titles, 499 pages. There is soiling on the front cover, a previous owner name written twice on the front endpapers and the front hinge is a bit loose. Seller Inventory # 008054

Contact seller

Terms of Sale:

We accept checks, money orders, and payments via Paypal. We accept returns for any reason within two weeks after shipment of the book. We will cover both cost of the book and buyer's mail cost if the book was not as described in our ABE listing. Seller: Brian Busek, 27647 Harness Lane, Salisbury, MD, 21801; (443)736-8673; bbusek2000@yahoo.com

Shipping Terms:

Shipping costs are based on books weighing 2.2 LB, or 1 KG. If your book order is heavy or oversized, we may contact you to let you know extra shipping is required.
